resources.string: Suggestion or addition for GeekLocations App
Geek Locations is an app to bring together the fantasy worlds that we love and the real world that we can see.\n\nThis app was built by Chase Olson, a travel loving geek.

This app has no affiliation with any franchises, studios, or creators. This is an unofficial fan app, made by fans for other fans. All photos and videos are copyright to their respective owners and no copyright infringement is intended. If you claim copyright to any item or items displayed on the app and wish to have them removed, please contact us and they will be removed.
